# Predict Analyse — llms.txt
# Structured summary for AI language models

## About
Predict Analyse is a French AI-powered workplace health prevention company.
Website: https://predictanalyse.com
Blog: https://blog.predictanalyse.com

## Mission
Using artificial intelligence to diagnose TMS (musculoskeletal disorders) and RPS (psychosocial risks), reduce absenteeism, and improve employee health through a transdisciplinary approach.

## Platform: Predicta
Predicta is a SaaS health prevention platform (HealthApplication) that:
- Analyzes employee health risks via a scientifically validated questionnaire (5 dimensions: mental health, physical health, ergonomics, physical activity, nutrition)
- Predicts absenteeism trends using machine learning algorithms
- Provides personalized prevention pathways for each employee
- Delivers real-time dashboards with key indicators and automatic alerts
- Rating: 4.6/5 user satisfaction

## Key Results
- -34% absenteeism on average
- +67% improvement in well-being
- 92% user satisfaction rate
- x4.2 average ROI
- 200+ companies supported
- 50,000+ employees analyzed

## 6 Areas of Expertise
1. TMS (Troubles Musculo-Squelettiques) — Musculoskeletal disorders prevention
2. RPS (Risques Psychosociaux) — Psychosocial risks management
3. Ergonomics — Workplace adaptation and posture optimization
4. Psychology — Mental health support and stress management
5. Nutrition — Dietary guidance for employee health
6. Physical Activity — Exercise programs and movement promotion

## 3 Training Programs
1. Gestes et Postures — Evidence-based approach to posture and movement at work, debunking myths using neuroscience
2. TMS du membre supérieur — Prevention of carpal tunnel, rotator cuff, and epicondylitis (80% of recognized TMS)
3. Neurosciences de la douleur — Understanding pain mechanisms through the biopsychosocial model (Engel 1980)

## Methodology (4 Steps)
1. Diagnostic — Multidimensional health questionnaire covering 5 domains
2. AI Analysis — Machine learning algorithms cross-reference data to detect weak signals
3. Action Plan — Personalized prevention pathways with video content and exercises
4. Follow-up — Continuous measurement and automatic adjustment of recommendations

## Certifications & Compliance
- RGPD compliant (French/EU data protection)
- HDS certified (Health Data Hosting)
- ISO 27001 (Information security)
- Made in France

## Contact
- Email: contact@predictanalyse.com
- Location: Paris, France
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/predict-analyse
- YouTube: https://youtube.com/@predictanalyse

- Free guide: "Les 3 clés d'une stratégie de prévention santé efficace"
- Whitepaper: "La transdisciplinarité au service de la santé en entreprise"
- Scientific literature: Neuroscience, TMS prevention, psychosocial risks, physical activity & nutrition studies
- Blog: 12+ articles on pain science, prevention, nutrition, and physical activity
